fields.name: ConfigurationReference
fields.description: Optional, Specifies the uri to an azure blob that will replace the default configuration for the package if provided

fields.name: EnableAutomaticUpgrade
fields.description: If set to true, when a new Gallery Application version is available in PIR/SIG, it will be automatically updated for the VM/VMSS

fields.name: Order
fields.description: Optional, Specifies the order in which the packages have to be installed

fields.name: PackageReferenceId
fields.description: Specifies the GalleryApplicationVersion resource id on the form of /subscriptions/{SubscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Compute/galleries/{galleryName}/applications/{application}/versions/{version}

fields.name: Tags
fields.description: Optional, Specifies a passthrough value for more generic context.

fields.name: TreatFailureAsDeploymentFailure
fields.description: Optional, If true, any failure for any operation in the VmApplication will fail the deployment
